info.name: Qwen3-TTS API
info.description: Postman Collection for Qwen3-TTS Fine-Tuning API

body.raw:
{
    "text": "Welcome to this audiobook. This voice was generated entirely from a text description.",
    "instruct": "A warm male voice, middle-aged, calm and authoritative",
    "language": "English",
    "upload_to_s3": true,
    "overwrite": false
}

request.description: Generate speech from a text description of the desired voice, using the VoiceDesign model directly.
Batch generate zero-shot voice cloning from a reference audio and text. Uses the Qwen3-TTS Base model.
